mario.definition_en: To increase speed or cause something to move faster.
mario.definition_zh: 让速度变快，或使某物加快前进。
mario.example_en: Mario accelerates off the starting grid to grab the lead.
mario.example_zh: 马里奥在起跑线上迅速加速，抢占领先位置。

mario.definition_en: A powered aircraft that is lighter than air; a flying vessel.
mario.definition_zh: 比空气轻的动力飞行器;飞行器。
mario.example_en: Race through Airship Fortress high above the clouds!
mario.example_zh: 在云端之上的飞艇要塞中比赛!

mario.definition_en: A tropical fruit; in Mario Kart, a peel used as a trap on the track.
mario.definition_zh: 一种热带水果;在马里奥赛车中,香蕉皮用作赛道上的陷阱。
mario.example_en: Drop banana peels to make your rivals slip and spin!
mario.example_zh: 扔下香蕉皮让你的对手打滑旋转!

mario.definition_en: A fight or contest between opponents; a competitive game mode.
mario.definition_zh: 对手之间的战斗或竞赛;竞技游戏模式。
mario.example_en: Compete in Balloon Battle to pop your rivals' balloons!
mario.example_zh: 参加气球对战戳破对手的气球!

mario.definition_en: A sandy or pebbly shore beside a body of water.
mario.definition_zh: 水体旁边的沙质或砾石海岸。
mario.example_en: Race along the sunny shores of Peach Beach!
mario.example_zh: 在碧琪海滩阳光灿烂的海岸上比赛!

mario.definition_en: A squid-like creature that sprays ink to block opponents' vision.
mario.definition_zh: 鱿鱼般的生物,喷射墨汁阻挡对手的视线。
mario.example_en: The Blooper splashes ink all over your screen!
mario.example_zh: 乌贼在你的屏幕上喷洒墨汁!

mario.definition_en: An explosive device; in Mario Kart, a Bob-omb that creates a large explosion.
mario.definition_zh: 爆炸装置;在马里奥赛车中,炸弹怪会制造大爆炸。
mario.example_en: Wario throws bob-ombs to blast through the competition!
mario.example_zh: 瓦里奥扔炸弹炸飞竞争对手!

mario.definition_en: To increase or improve something; in racing, a sudden increase in speed.
mario.definition_zh: 增加或改进某物;在赛车中,速度的突然提升。
mario.example_en: Get a boost start by timing your acceleration perfectly!
mario.example_zh: 通过完美把握加速时机获得起跑加速!

mario.definition_en: A projectile shot from a weapon; transforms racer into high-speed missile.
mario.definition_zh: 从武器射出的弹丸;将赛车手变成高速导弹。
mario.example_en: Transform into a Bullet Bill and fly past everyone!
mario.example_zh: 变成子弹刺客飞越所有人!

mario.definition_en: A large fortified building from medieval times; a stronghold.
mario.definition_zh: 中世纪时期的大型防御建筑;堡垒。
mario.example_en: Bowser's Castle is the most dangerous track!
mario.example_zh: 酷霸王城堡是最危险的赛道!

mario.definition_en: A difficult task or problem that tests one's abilities.
mario.definition_zh: 考验能力的困难任务或问题。
mario.example_en: Every cup presents a new challenge to overcome!
mario.example_zh: 每个杯赛都呈现需要克服的新挑战!

mario.definition_en: A person who has defeated all opponents in a competition.
mario.definition_zh: 在比赛中击败所有对手的人。
mario.example_en: Mario becomes the racing champion once again!
mario.example_zh: 马里奥再次成为赛车冠军!

mario.definition_en: A person in a game, story, or play; a playable figure.
mario.definition_zh: 游戏、故事或戏剧中的人物;可操作的角色。
mario.example_en: Choose your favorite character to race with!
mario.example_zh: 选择你最喜欢的角色来比赛!

mario.definition_en: A closed track or path for racing; a circular route.
mario.definition_zh: 用于比赛的封闭赛道或路径;环形路线。
mario.example_en: Mario Circuit is a classic racing track loved by fans.
mario.example_zh: 马里奥赛道是深受粉丝喜爱的经典赛道。

mario.definition_en: A flat, round piece of metal used as money; in Mario Kart, increases top speed.
mario.definition_zh: 用作货币的扁平圆形金属片;在马里奥赛车中,提升最高速度。
mario.example_en: Collect coins to increase your kart's maximum speed.
mario.example_zh: 收集金币提升你的卡丁车最高速度。

mario.definition_en: A dry, sandy region with little rainfall and sparse vegetation.
mario.definition_zh: 降雨稀少、植被稀疏的干燥沙质地区。
mario.example_en: Navigate through Desert Hills' challenging sand dunes.
mario.example_zh: 穿越沙漠丘陵充满挑战的沙丘。

mario.definition_en: To slide sideways in a controlled manner, especially while cornering at high speed.
mario.definition_zh: 以受控的方式侧滑,尤其是在高速转弯时。
mario.example_en: Mario performs a perfect drift around the tight corner.
mario.example_zh: 马里奥在急转弯处完美地漂移过弯。

mario.definition_en: A light covering that forms the outer covering of a bird; allows jumping.
mario.definition_zh: 鸟类外层的轻质覆盖物;允许跳跃。
mario.example_en: Use the feather to jump over obstacles on the track!
mario.example_zh: 使用羽毛跳过赛道上的障碍物!

mario.definition_en: To bring to an end; to complete; the final point of a race.
mario.definition_zh: 使结束;完成;比赛的终点。
mario.example_en: Cross the finish line to complete the race!
mario.example_zh: 冲过终点线完成比赛!

mario.definition_en: A colorful plant bloom; in Mario Kart, a special power-up item.
mario.definition_zh: 色彩艳丽的植物花朵;在马里奥赛车中,一种特殊的道具。
mario.example_en: Grab the Fire Flower to shoot fireballs at opponents!
mario.example_zh: 获得火焰花向对手发射火球!

mario.definition_en: A mushroom-like enemy creature from the Mario universe.
mario.definition_zh: 来自马里奥宇宙的蘑菇状敌人生物。
mario.example_en: Avoid the Goombas walking on the race course!
mario.example_zh: 避开在赛道上行走的栗宝宝!

mario.definition_en: A tool with a heavy head for pounding; an offensive item in racing.
mario.definition_zh: 带有沉重头部的敲击工具;赛车中的进攻性道具。
mario.example_en: Throw hammers to knock out racers ahead of you!
mario.example_zh: 投掷锤子击倒你前面的赛车手!

mario.definition_en: A device that makes a loud sound; protects from incoming shells.
mario.definition_zh: 发出响亮声音的装置;保护免受来袭的龟壳攻击。
mario.example_en: Blast the Super Horn to deflect the Spiny Shell!
mario.example_zh: 使用超级喇叭偏转刺甲龟壳!

mario.definition_en: To push oneself off the ground or another surface; to leap.
mario.definition_zh: 将自己从地面或其他表面推起;跳跃。
mario.example_en: Perform a jump boost over ramps for extra speed!
mario.example_zh: 在斜坡上进行跳跃加速获得额外速度!

mario.definition_en: The person who is ahead of others; one who guides or directs.
mario.definition_zh: 领先于他人的人;指引或指导的人。
mario.example_en: Luigi takes the lead in the final lap!
mario.example_zh: 路易吉在最后一圈取得领先!

mario.definition_en: A flash of bright light in the sky during a storm; in Mario Kart, strikes all opponents.
mario.definition_zh: 暴风雨中天空的闪光;在马里奥赛车中,攻击所有对手。
mario.example_en: Lightning shrinks all other racers temporarily!
mario.example_zh: 闪电暂时缩小所有其他赛车手!

mario.definition_en: A large natural elevation of land rising high above its surroundings.
mario.definition_zh: 高出周围环境的大型天然陆地隆起。
mario.example_en: Choco Mountain features steep climbs and sharp turns.
mario.example_zh: 巧克力山拥有陡峭的爬坡和急转弯。

mario.definition_en: A type of fungus; in Mario Kart, an item that provides a speed boost.
mario.definition_zh: 一种真菌;在马里奥赛车中,提供加速提升的道具。
mario.example_en: Use a mushroom to boost past your opponents!
mario.example_zh: 使用蘑菇加速超越你的对手!

mario.definition_en: To move ahead of another competitor, especially on a racetrack.
mario.definition_zh: 在赛道上超过其他对手，占据领先位置。
mario.example_en: Bowser overtakes Wario with a perfectly timed Red Shell.
mario.example_zh: 库巴用精准的红龟壳成功超越瓦里奥。

mario.definition_en: A flightless seabird; appears as an obstacle or character in icy tracks.
mario.definition_zh: 不会飞的海鸟;在冰雪赛道上作为障碍或角色出现。
mario.example_en: Watch out for penguins sliding across the frozen track!
mario.example_zh: 小心企鹅在冰冻赛道上滑行!

mario.definition_en: A daughter of a monarch; a female member of a royal family.
mario.definition_zh: 君主的女儿;皇室的女性成员。
mario.example_en: Princess Peach is an elegant and skilled racer.
mario.example_zh: 碧琪公主是一位优雅而技术娴熟的赛车手。

mario.definition_en: A competition of speed; to compete against others to finish first.
mario.definition_zh: 速度竞赛;与他人竞争以最先完成。
mario.example_en: Luigi enters the VS race to prove his racing skills.
mario.example_zh: 路易吉参加对战比赛证明他的赛车技术。

mario.definition_en: A multicolored arc in the sky caused by light refraction in water droplets.
mario.definition_zh: 天空中因光线在水滴中折射而形成的多色弧形。
mario.example_en: Rainbow Road is the ultimate challenge for racers!
mario.example_zh: 彩虹之路是赛车手的终极挑战!

mario.definition_en: A person competing with another for the same objective or superiority.
mario.definition_zh: 为了同一目标或优势与他人竞争的人。
mario.example_en: Bowser is Mario's biggest rival on the race track.
mario.example_zh: 酷霸王是马里奥在赛道上最大的对手。

mario.definition_en: A paved way for vehicles and pedestrians to travel.
mario.definition_zh: 供车辆和行人通行的铺设路面。
mario.example_en: Roads connect all the courses in Mario Kart World.
mario.example_zh: 道路连接着马里奥赛车世界的所有赛道。

mario.definition_en: A hard protective outer covering, especially in Mario Kart, a weapon item.
mario.definition_zh: 坚硬的保护性外壳,在马里奥赛车中是一种武器道具。
mario.example_en: Bowser throws a red shell to hit the racer ahead.
mario.example_zh: 酷霸王扔出红色龟壳攻击前方的赛车手。

mario.definition_en: The rate at which something moves or operates; rapidity of motion.
mario.definition_zh: 某物移动或运作的速率;运动的快速程度。
mario.example_en: Increase your speed with a mushroom power-up!
mario.example_zh: 用蘑菇道具提升你的速度!

mario.definition_en: A large venue for sporting events with spectator seating.
mario.definition_zh: 举办体育赛事的大型场馆,设有观众席位。
mario.example_en: Peach Stadium hosts exciting kart races.
mario.example_zh: 碧琪体育场举办激动人心的卡丁车比赛。

mario.definition_en: A celestial body; in Mario Kart, a power-up that grants invincibility.
mario.definition_zh: 天体;在马里奥赛车中,一种赋予无敌状态的强化道具。
mario.example_en: Rosalina grabs a super star and becomes invincible.
mario.example_zh: 罗莎琳娜获得无敌星,进入无敌状态。

mario.definition_en: A test of ability or endurance; racing alone to beat the best time.
mario.definition_zh: 能力或耐力的测试;单独比赛以打破最佳时间。
mario.example_en: Race in Time Trial mode to set a new record!
mario.example_zh: 在计时赛模式中创造新纪录!

mario.definition_en: A prize or memento awarded to a winner, typically a decorative object.
mario.definition_zh: 颁发给获胜者的奖品或纪念品,通常是装饰性物品。
mario.example_en: Win the Grand Prix to earn the golden trophy!
mario.example_zh: 赢得大奖赛获得金色奖杯!

mario.definition_en: A sudden burst of extra speed triggered by items or track features.
mario.definition_zh: 由道具或赛道装置触发的瞬间速度爆发。
mario.example_en: A Dash Panel gives Yoshi a turbo boost down the neon straightaway.
mario.example_zh: 冲刺板让耀西在霓虹直道上获得涡轮冲刺。

mario.definition_en: Success in a contest or battle; the act of defeating an opponent.
mario.definition_zh: 在竞赛或战斗中的成功;击败对手的行为。
mario.example_en: Celebrate your victory with the Star Cup trophy!
mario.example_zh: 用星星杯奖杯庆祝你的胜利!

zelda.definition_en: An unusual, exciting, and possibly dangerous activity or experience.
zelda.definition_zh: 一种不寻常的、令人兴奋的、可能有危险的活动或经历。
zelda.example_en: Link embarks on an epic adventure across Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 林克在海拉鲁大陆上展开了一场史诗般的冒险。

zelda.definition_en: Belonging to the very distant past; very old or aged.
zelda.definition_zh: 属于非常遥远的过去;非常古老或年代久远的。
zelda.example_en: Ancient shrines hold the secrets of the past.
zelda.example_zh: 古代神殿蕴藏着过去的秘密。

zelda.definition_en: A person who shoots with a bow and arrows, especially at a target for sport.
zelda.definition_zh: 使用弓箭射击的人,尤其是作为运动瞄准目标射击的人。
zelda.example_en: Link is a skilled archer with perfect aim.
zelda.example_zh: 林克是一位技艺高超、百发百中的弓箭手。

zelda.definition_en: A projectile with a pointed tip, designed to be shot from a bow.
zelda.definition_zh: 带有尖头的抛射物,设计用于从弓上射出。
zelda.example_en: Link fires arrows with precision at distant targets.
zelda.example_zh: 林克精准地向远处目标射箭。

zelda.definition_en: A sustained fight between armed forces; a prolonged struggle or conflict.
zelda.definition_zh: 武装力量之间的持续战斗;长期的斗争或冲突。
zelda.example_en: Link engages in battles against dangerous monsters.
zelda.example_zh: 林克与危险的怪物进行战斗。

zelda.definition_en: A warm-blooded animal with feathers, wings, and a beak that typically can fly.
zelda.definition_zh: 有羽毛、翅膀和喙的温血动物,通常能够飞翔。
zelda.example_en: A flock of birds flies across the vast sky of Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 一群鸟儿飞越海拉鲁辽阔的天空。

zelda.definition_en: A common goblin-like monster found throughout Hyrule.
zelda.definition_zh: 在海拉鲁各地常见的类似哥布林的怪物。
zelda.example_en: Bokoblins are one of the most common enemies Link encounters.
zelda.example_zh: 波克布林是林克遇到的最常见的敌人之一。

zelda.definition_en: The air taken into or expelled from the lungs; a slight movement of air.
zelda.definition_zh: 吸入或呼出肺部的空气;轻微的空气流动。
zelda.example_en: The Breath of the Wild represents freedom and life in nature.
zelda.example_zh: 旷野之息代表着自由和大自然中的生命。

zelda.definition_en: A structure carrying a road or path over a river, road, or other obstacle.
zelda.definition_zh: 承载道路或小径跨越河流、道路或其他障碍物的结构。
zelda.example_en: The Bridge of Hylia spans across a vast canyon.
zelda.example_zh: 海利亚大桥横跨广阔的峡谷。

zelda.definition_en: An event causing great and often sudden damage or distress; a disaster.
zelda.definition_zh: 造成巨大且经常是突然的破坏或痛苦的事件;灾难。
zelda.example_en: Calamity Ganon brought destruction to the kingdom of Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 灾厄加农为海拉鲁王国带来了毁灭。

zelda.definition_en: A deep, narrow valley with steep sides, often carved by a river.
zelda.definition_zh: 有陡峭两侧的深窄山谷，通常由河流侵蚀而成。
zelda.example_en: The Gerudo Canyon leads to the desert region.
zelda.example_zh: 格鲁德峡谷通往沙漠地区。

zelda.definition_en: A large fortified building or group of buildings with thick walls, typically from the medieval period.
zelda.definition_zh: 带有厚墙的大型防御建筑或建筑群,通常来自中世纪时期。
zelda.example_en: Hyrule Castle is the heart of the kingdom.
zelda.example_zh: 海拉鲁城堡是王国的中心。

zelda.definition_en: A person who fights or speaks publicly in support of a cause; a warrior of exceptional skill.
zelda.definition_zh: 为某项事业公开战斗或发声的人;技艺高超的战士。
zelda.example_en: The four Champions were chosen to pilot the Divine Beasts.
zelda.example_zh: 四位英雄被选中来操控神兽。

zelda.definition_en: A steep rock face, especially at the edge of the sea or a mountain.
zelda.definition_zh: 陡峭的岩石表面,尤其是在海边或山边。
zelda.example_en: Link climbs steep cliffs to reach new areas.
zelda.example_zh: 林克攀爬陡峭的悬崖到达新区域。

zelda.definition_en: To go up or ascend, especially by using the hands and feet.
zelda.definition_zh: 向上移动或攀升,尤其是使用手和脚。
zelda.example_en: Link can climb almost any surface in Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 林克几乎能攀爬海拉鲁的任何表面。

zelda.definition_en: A visible mass of water droplets or ice crystals suspended in the atmosphere.
zelda.definition_zh: 悬浮在大气中的可见水滴或冰晶团。
zelda.example_en: Clouds drift across the sky above Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 云朵在海拉鲁的天空中飘过。

zelda.definition_en: A person or animal with whom one spends time or travels; a partner or friend.
zelda.definition_zh: 与某人共度时光或一起旅行的人或动物;伙伴或朋友。
zelda.example_en: A loyal horse is Link's faithful companion.
zelda.example_zh: 一匹忠诚的马是林克忠实的伙伴。

zelda.definition_en: The practice or skill of preparing food by combining, mixing, and heating ingredients.
zelda.definition_zh: 通过混合、搅拌和加热食材来准备食物的技能或做法。
zelda.example_en: Link improves his cooking skills to create powerful dishes.
zelda.example_zh: 林克提高烹饪技能来制作强大的料理。

zelda.definition_en: The ability to do something that frightens one; strength in the face of pain.
zelda.definition_zh: 做让人害怕的事情的能力;面对痛苦时的力量。
zelda.example_en: Link embodies the spirit of courage.
zelda.example_zh: 林克体现了勇气的精神。

zelda.definition_en: A barren area of land with little precipitation and extreme temperatures.
zelda.definition_zh: 降水稀少、温度极端的贫瘠地区。
zelda.example_en: The Gerudo Desert is harsh and unforgiving.
zelda.example_zh: 格鲁德沙漠严酷而无情。

zelda.definition_en: A magical or medicinal potion that heals or grants special abilities.
zelda.definition_zh: 具有治疗或赋予特殊能力的魔法或药用药水。
zelda.example_en: Link brews elixirs to restore health and gain temporary powers.
zelda.example_zh: 林克调制灵药来恢复生命值并获得临时能力。

zelda.definition_en: A small magical being with wings that can restore health.
zelda.definition_zh: 有翅膀的小型魔法生物，可以恢复生命值。
zelda.example_en: Fairies can revive Link if he falls in battle.
zelda.example_zh: 如果林克在战斗中倒下，妖精可以复活他。

zelda.definition_en: An open area of land, especially one planted with crops or used for grazing.
zelda.definition_zh: 开阔的土地区域,尤其是种植作物或用于放牧的地方。
zelda.example_en: Hyrule Field is a vast open area to explore.
zelda.example_zh: 海拉鲁平原是一片广阔的开放区域供探索。

zelda.definition_en: The seed-bearing part of a plant, often brightly colored and with a sweet scent.
zelda.definition_zh: 植物的开花部分,通常色彩鲜艳并带有芬芳的香气。
zelda.example_en: The Silent Princess is a rare and beautiful flower.
zelda.example_zh: 寂静公主是一种稀有而美丽的花。

zelda.definition_en: A large area covered with trees and plants; a woodland.
zelda.definition_zh: 被树木和植物覆盖的大片区域;林地。
zelda.example_en: Dense forests cover much of Hyrule's landscape.
zelda.example_zh: 茂密的森林覆盖了海拉鲁的大部分地貌。

zelda.definition_en: A race of warrior women living in the desert region of Hyrule.
zelda.definition_zh: 生活在海拉鲁沙漠地区的女战士种族。
zelda.example_en: The Gerudo people have their own language and customs.
zelda.example_zh: 格鲁德人有自己的语言和习俗。

zelda.definition_en: A race of large, rock-eating people who live in volcanic regions.
zelda.definition_zh: 居住在火山地区的巨大的、以岩石为食的种族。
zelda.example_en: The Gorons are known for their strength and mining skills.
zelda.example_zh: 格龙族以其力量和采矿技能而闻名。

zelda.definition_en: A defender, protector, or keeper; something that watches over or protects.
zelda.definition_zh: 保卫者、保护者或看守者;监视或保护某物的东西。
zelda.example_en: Ancient Guardians patrol the ruins of Hyrule Castle.
zelda.example_zh: 远古守护者在海拉鲁城堡的废墟中巡逻。

zelda.definition_en: A person admired for courage, noble qualities, and outstanding achievements.
zelda.definition_zh: 因勇气、高尚品质和杰出成就而受人钦佩的人。
zelda.example_en: Link is the hero destined to save Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 林克是命中注定拯救海拉鲁的英雄。

zelda.definition_en: A giant cyclops-like monster that sleeps during the day.
zelda.definition_zh: 像独眼巨人一样的大型怪物，白天会睡觉。
zelda.example_en: The Hinox wears weapons around its neck like a necklace.
zelda.example_zh: 希诺克斯把武器像项链一样戴在脖子上。

zelda.definition_en: A large four-legged animal used for riding and carrying loads.
zelda.definition_zh: 用于骑乘和运载的大型四足动物。
zelda.example_en: Link tames wild horses in the open fields.
zelda.example_zh: 林克在开阔的田野上驯服野马。

zelda.definition_en: A building for people to live in, typically for one family.
zelda.definition_zh: 供人们居住的建筑物,通常供一个家庭使用。
zelda.example_en: Traditional houses in Kakariko Village have unique architecture.
zelda.example_zh: 卡卡利科村的传统房屋有独特的建筑风格。

zelda.definition_en: An act of traveling from one place to another; an adventure or experience.
zelda.definition_zh: 从一个地方到另一个地方的旅行行为;冒险或经历。
zelda.example_en: Link's journey across Hyrule is full of discoveries.
zelda.example_zh: 林克穿越海拉鲁的旅程充满了发现。

zelda.definition_en: To push oneself off the ground using the legs and feet.
zelda.definition_zh: 用腿和脚将自己推离地面。
zelda.example_en: Enemies can jump to attack from above.
zelda.example_zh: 敌人可以跳跃从上方进行攻击。

zelda.definition_en: A small forest spirit in the shape of a wooden creature with leaves.
zelda.definition_zh: 形状像木制生物并长着叶子的小型森林精灵。
zelda.example_en: Finding all the Koroks hidden across Hyrule is a great challenge.
zelda.example_zh: 找到隐藏在海拉鲁各处的所有克洛格是一个巨大的挑战。

zelda.definition_en: A traditional story sometimes popularly regarded as historical but not authenticated.
zelda.definition_zh: 一个传统故事,有时被普遍认为是历史性的但未经证实。
zelda.example_en: The Legend of Zelda has been passed down through generations.
zelda.example_zh: 塞尔达传说世代相传。

zelda.definition_en: A reptilian monster that is agile and attacks with weapons.
zelda.definition_zh: 敏捷的爬行类怪物，会使用武器攻击。
zelda.example_en: Lizalfos can camouflage themselves in certain environments.
zelda.example_zh: 蜥蜴战士可以在某些环境中伪装自己。

zelda.definition_en: A powerful centaur-like creature that is one of the most dangerous enemies in Hyrule.
zelda.definition_zh: 强大的半人马生物，是海拉鲁最危险的敌人之一。
zelda.example_en: Lynels are incredibly tough and require skill to defeat.
zelda.example_zh: 人马非常强大，需要技巧才能战胜。

zelda.definition_en: A large pig-like monster that is stronger than Bokoblins.
zelda.definition_zh: 像猪一样的大型怪物，比波克布林更强大。
zelda.example_en: Moblins wield heavy weapons and deal massive damage.
zelda.example_zh: 魔布林使用重型武器，造成巨大伤害。

zelda.definition_en: A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising to a summit.
zelda.definition_zh: 地球表面隆起至顶峰的巨大自然高地。
zelda.example_en: Link climbs high mountains to explore new regions.
zelda.example_zh: 林克攀登高山探索新的地区。

zelda.definition_en: A naturally occurring solid material from which a metal or valuable mineral can be extracted.
zelda.definition_zh: 可以从中提取金属或贵重矿物的天然固体材料。
zelda.example_en: Link mines ore deposits to collect valuable materials for crafting.
zelda.example_zh: 林克开采矿石以收集用于制作的宝贵材料。

zelda.definition_en: A lightweight, free-flying, foot-launched aircraft with no rigid structure.
zelda.definition_zh: 一种轻便的、自由飞行的、用脚起飞的无刚性结构飞行器。
zelda.example_en: The paraglider allows Link to glide safely from high places.
zelda.example_zh: 滑翔伞让林克能够从高处安全滑翔。

zelda.definition_en: An area of fairly level high ground.
zelda.definition_zh: 一片相当平坦的高地。
zelda.example_en: Link begins his adventure on the Great Plateau.
zelda.example_zh: 林克在大高原开始他的冒险。

zelda.definition_en: The daughter of a monarch; a female member of a royal family.
zelda.definition_zh: 君主的女儿;皇室的女性成员。
zelda.example_en: Princess Zelda possesses the power to seal away darkness.
zelda.example_zh: 塞尔达公主拥有封印黑暗的力量。

zelda.definition_en: A long or arduous search for something; a journey made in search of something.
zelda.definition_zh: 长期或艰苦地寻找某物;为寻找某物而进行的旅程。
zelda.example_en: Link's quest is to defeat Ganon and save Princess Zelda.
zelda.example_zh: 林克的任务是打败加农并拯救塞尔达公主。

zelda.definition_en: A large natural stream of water flowing in a channel to the sea, a lake, or another river.
zelda.definition_zh: 在河道中流向大海、湖泊或其他河流的大型天然水流。
zelda.example_en: Many rivers flow through the diverse lands of Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 许多河流流经海拉鲁的多样化土地。

zelda.definition_en: The ground along the edge of a river.
zelda.definition_zh: 沿着河流边缘的地面。
zelda.example_en: The Riverside Stable is located near a peaceful river.
zelda.example_zh: 河畔马厩坐落在一条宁静的河流附近。

zelda.definition_en: A mystical symbol or letter with magical powers used in ancient writing.
zelda.definition_zh: 具有魔力的神秘符号或字母，用于古代文字。
zelda.example_en: Link's Sheikah Slate has various rune abilities like bombs and magnesis.
zelda.example_zh: 林克的希卡之石拥有各种符文能力，如炸弹和磁力。

zelda.definition_en: The currency used throughout Hyrule for trading and purchasing items.
zelda.definition_zh: 在海拉鲁各地用于交易和购买物品的货币。
zelda.example_en: Link collects rupees to buy equipment and supplies from merchants.
zelda.example_zh: 林克收集卢比从商人那里购买装备和补给。

zelda.definition_en: An ancient race of people known for their advanced technology and loyalty to the Royal Family.
zelda.definition_zh: 以先进技术和对皇室的忠诚而闻名的古老种族。
zelda.example_en: The Sheikah created advanced technology 10,000 years ago.
zelda.example_zh: 希卡族在一万年前创造了先进的技术。

zelda.definition_en: A broad piece of armor held for protection against weapons or blows.
zelda.definition_zh: 用于抵御武器或打击的宽阔盔甲片。
zelda.example_en: Link uses his shield to block enemy attacks.
zelda.example_zh: 林克使用他的盾牌来阻挡敌人的攻击。

zelda.definition_en: A place regarded as holy because of its associations with a divinity or sacred person or relic.
zelda.definition_zh: 因与神灵、圣人或圣物有关而被视为神圣的地方。
zelda.example_en: Link must complete trials in 120 shrines scattered across Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 林克必须完成散布在海拉鲁各处的120个神殿的试炼。

zelda.definition_en: The region of the atmosphere seen from the earth; the upper air.
zelda.definition_zh: 从地球上看到的大气层区域;高空。
zelda.example_en: The sky over Hyrule changes from dawn to dusk.
zelda.example_zh: 海拉鲁的天空从黎明变化到黄昏。

zelda.definition_en: Frozen water vapor that falls from clouds as white flakes.
zelda.definition_zh: 从云中落下的冻结水蒸气,呈白色片状。
zelda.example_en: Link travels through snowy mountains in his quest.
zelda.example_zh: 林克在探索中穿越雪山。

zelda.definition_en: The non-physical part of a person; the essence of life and consciousness.
zelda.definition_zh: 人的非物质部分;生命和意识的本质。
zelda.example_en: The Forest of Spirits is a mystical place.
zelda.example_zh: 灵魂之森是一个神秘的地方。

zelda.definition_en: A building where horses are kept and cared for.
zelda.definition_zh: 饲养和照料马匹的建筑。
zelda.example_en: Link can register his horses at any stable across Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 林克可以在海拉鲁的任何马厩登记他的马匹。

zelda.definition_en: To be in an upright position on the feet; to be situated or located.
zelda.definition_zh: 用脚保持直立姿势;位于或坐落。
zelda.example_en: Link stands before the legendary Master Sword.
zelda.example_zh: 林克站在传说中的大师之剑前。

zelda.definition_en: A violent disturbance of the atmosphere with strong winds and rain, thunder, or lightning.
zelda.definition_zh: 大气的剧烈扰动,伴随强风和雨、雷或闪电。
zelda.example_en: Storms can be dangerous during mountain climbing.
zelda.example_zh: 爬山时遇到暴风雨可能很危险。

zelda.definition_en: The time when the sun disappears below the horizon in the evening.
zelda.definition_zh: 太阳在傍晚消失在地平线下的时刻。
zelda.example_en: The sunset over Hyrule creates a breathtaking view.
zelda.example_zh: 海拉鲁的日落创造出令人惊叹的景色。

zelda.definition_en: To move through water by moving the body or parts of the body.
zelda.definition_zh: 通过移动身体或身体部位在水中移动。
zelda.example_en: Link swims across rivers and lakes on his journey.
zelda.example_zh: 林克在旅程中游过河流和湖泊。

zelda.definition_en: A weapon with a long metal blade and a hilt with a handguard, used for thrusting or striking.
zelda.definition_zh: 一种带有长金属刀刃和带护手柄的武器,用于刺击或劈砍。
zelda.example_en: The Master Sword is the legendary blade of evil's bane.
zelda.example_zh: 大师剑是传说中驱除邪恶的利刃。

zelda.definition_en: A building devoted to the worship of a god or gods; a sacred place.
zelda.definition_zh: 供奉神灵的建筑;神圣的地方。
zelda.example_en: The Temple of Time stands as an ancient monument.
zelda.example_zh: 时之神殿屹立为一座古老的纪念碑。

zelda.definition_en: A tall, narrow building or structure that rises high into the air.
zelda.definition_zh: 高耸入云的高大狭窄建筑或结构。
zelda.example_en: Climbing towers reveals the map of each region.
zelda.example_zh: 攀爬高塔可以揭示每个地区的地图。

zelda.definition_en: A woody perennial plant with a trunk and branches, typically growing to a considerable height.
zelda.definition_zh: 有树干和枝条的木本多年生植物,通常生长到相当高度。
zelda.example_en: Link chops trees to gather wood for crafting.
zelda.example_zh: 林克砍树收集木材用于制作。

zelda.definition_en: A test of abilities, endurance, or patience; a difficult experience.
zelda.definition_zh: 对能力、耐力或耐心的考验;艰难的经历。
zelda.example_en: The Master Trials test Link's combat skills.
zelda.example_zh: 大师试炼考验林克的战斗技能。

zelda.definition_en: A small community or group of houses in a rural area, smaller than a town.
zelda.definition_zh: 乡村地区的小型社区或房屋群,比城镇小。
zelda.example_en: Hateno Village is a peaceful settlement in Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: 哈特诺村是海拉鲁的一个宁静定居点。

zelda.definition_en: A brave or experienced soldier or fighter; a person engaged in warfare.
zelda.definition_zh: 勇敢或经验丰富的士兵或战士;参与战斗的人。
zelda.example_en: Daruk is a mighty Goron warrior.
zelda.example_zh: 达尔克是一位强大的戈隆族战士。

zelda.definition_en: An uncultivated, uninhabited, and inhospitable region; wild and natural land.
zelda.definition_zh: 未开垦、无人居住且不宜居的地区;荒凉的自然土地。
zelda.example_en: Explore the vast wilderness of Hyrule and discover its secrets.
zelda.example_zh: 探索海拉鲁广阔的荒野,发现它的秘密。

zelda.definition_en: The quality of having experience, knowledge, and good judgment.
zelda.definition_zh: 拥有经验、知识和良好判断力的品质。
zelda.example_en: Princess Zelda possesses great wisdom and knowledge.
zelda.example_zh: 塞尔达公主拥有伟大的智慧和知识。

zelda.definition_en: A wild carnivorous mammal that lives and hunts in packs.
zelda.definition_zh: 成群生活和狩猎的野生食肉哺乳动物。
zelda.example_en: Wolf Link accompanies Link on his adventure.
zelda.example_zh: 狼林克陪伴林克进行冒险。

zhanglinghe.definition_en: A disturbed state of mind characterized by restlessness, illusions, and incoherence; an acutely confused state of consciousness.
zhanglinghe.definition_zh: 理智与情感崩溃的混乱状态;一种精神错乱的急性意识混乱状态,带有诗意疯狂的病态美感。
zhanglinghe.example_en: Between desire and despair, he wandered in a delirium of love.
zhanglinghe.example_zh: 在欲望与绝望之间,他徘徊在爱的谵妄中。

zhanglinghe.definition_en: A dark area or shape produced by something blocking the light; a person or thing that follows or accompanies someone constantly.
zhanglinghe.definition_zh: 物体遮挡光线而产生的阴暗区域;始终跟随或陪伴某人的人或事物。
zhanglinghe.example_en: In the palace, everyone lives in the shadow of power and fate.
zhanglinghe.example_zh: 在宫廷中,每个人都生活在权力与命运的阴影之下。

hayday.definition_zh: 小麦是一种重要的谷物作物,是制作面粉、面包和许多其他食品的基础原料。在卡通农场中,小麦是最基础的农作物,生长时间仅需2分钟,是新手玩家的首选作物。
hayday.definition_en: A cereal grain that is a staple food used to make flour, bread, and many other products. It's the first and fastest-growing crop in Hay Day.
hayday.example_en: Plant wheat in your field and harvest it after 2 minutes.
hayday.example_zh: 在你的田地里种植小麦,2分钟后收获。

hayday.definition_zh: 玉米是一种营养丰富的谷物,既可以直接食用,也可以加工成多种食品和饲料。在游戏中,玉米是第二种解锁的作物,生长时间为5分钟,可用于制作玉米面包、爆米花等产品。
hayday.definition_en: A cereal grain that can be eaten fresh or processed into various foods and animal feed. Essential for making corn bread and popcorn.
hayday.example_en: Corn takes 5 minutes to grow and is used in many recipes.
hayday.example_zh: 玉米需要5分钟生长,用于许多配方中。

hayday.definition_zh: 大豆是一种高蛋白质的豆类作物,是素食主义者重要的蛋白质来源。在游戏中,大豆在5级解锁,生长时间为20分钟,主要用于制作豆腐、酱油等产品和动物饲料。
hayday.definition_en: A legume high in protein, used to make tofu, soy sauce, and animal feed. Unlocked at level 5 with a 20-minute growth time.
hayday.example_en: Soybeans are perfect for making nutritious animal feed.
hayday.example_zh: 大豆非常适合制作营养丰富的动物饲料。

hayday.definition_zh: 甘蔗是制糖的主要原料,茎秆中含有丰富的糖分。在游戏中,甘蔗在7级解锁,生长时间为30分钟,用于制作白糖、红糖等甜味剂。
hayday.definition_en: A tall grass plant from which sugar is extracted. Takes 30 minutes to grow and is used to make white and brown sugar.
hayday.example_en: Harvest sugarcane to make sweet brown sugar for your products.
hayday.example_zh: 收获甘蔗来为你的产品制作甜美的红糖。

hayday.definition_zh: 胡萝卜是一种根茎类蔬菜,富含维生素A和胡萝卜素,对视力有益。在游戏中,胡萝卜在9级解锁,生长时间为10分钟,可用于制作胡萝卜派、胡萝卜蛋糕等美食。
hayday.definition_en: An orange root vegetable rich in vitamin A and beta-carotene. Used to make carrot pie and carrot cake in the game.
hayday.example_en: Plant carrots to make delicious carrot pie for your customers.
hayday.example_zh: 种植胡萝卜为你的顾客制作美味的胡萝卜派。

hayday.definition_zh: 靛蓝是一种用于提取天然蓝色染料的植物,在历史上被广泛用于纺织品染色。在游戏中,靛蓝在13级解锁,生长时间为45分钟,用于制作蓝色染料。
hayday.definition_en: A plant used to extract natural blue dye, historically used for coloring textiles. Takes 45 minutes to grow and is used to make blue dye.
hayday.example_en: Grow indigo plants to produce beautiful blue dyes for your products.
hayday.example_zh: 种植靛蓝植物来为你的产品制作美丽的蓝色染料。

hayday.definition_zh: 南瓜是一种大型的葫芦科蔬菜,富含营养,常用于制作汤、派等食品。在游戏中,南瓜在15级解锁,生长时间为3小时,用于制作南瓜派等季节性美食。
hayday.definition_en: A large orange gourd vegetable often used in pies and soups. Takes 3 hours to grow and is perfect for making pumpkin pie.
hayday.example_en: Grow pumpkins in autumn to make festive pumpkin pie.
hayday.example_zh: 在秋天种植南瓜来制作节日南瓜派。

hayday.definition_zh: 苹果是一种甜美的水果,富含纤维和维生素。在游戏中,苹果树需要在农场上种植,每棵树可以收获多次。
hayday.definition_en: A sweet fruit rich in fiber and vitamins. Apple trees can be harvested multiple times.

hayday.definition_zh: 棉花不是食用作物,而是纺织原料,用于制作各种布料和衣物。在游戏中,棉花在18级解锁,生长时间为2小时,用于制作棉布衬衫、毛线帽等纺织品。
hayday.definition_en: A soft, fluffy fiber used to make textiles and clothing. Not edible, but essential for making cotton shirts and other fabric items.
hayday.example_en: Harvest cotton to weave cloth for making shirts and sweaters.
hayday.example_zh: 收获棉花来编织布料制作衬衫和毛衣。

hayday.definition_zh: 覆盆子是一种小巧的红色浆果,味道酸甜可口,富含抗氧化剂。
hayday.definition_en: A small red berry that is sweet-tart and rich in antioxidants.

hayday.definition_zh: 樱桃是一种小而圆的红色水果,味道甜美,常用于制作果酱和甜点。
hayday.definition_en: A small, round red fruit that is sweet and commonly used in jams and desserts.

hayday.definition_zh: 辣椒是一种辛辣的蔬菜,富含维生素C和辣椒素,可以为食物增添辣味。在游戏中,辣椒在25级解锁,生长时间为2小时,用于制作辣味食品。
hayday.definition_en: A spicy vegetable rich in vitamin C and capsaicin that adds heat to dishes. Takes 2 hours to grow and is used for spicy recipes.
hayday.example_en: Harvest chili peppers to make spicy salsa and hot sauces.
hayday.example_zh: 收获辣椒来制作辣味沙拉酱和辣酱。

hayday.definition_zh: 黑莓是一种深紫色的浆果,富含维生素和矿物质,味道酸甜可口。
hayday.definition_en: A dark purple berry rich in vitamins and minerals with a sweet-tart flavor.

hayday.definition_zh: 番茄是一种红色的果实蔬菜,富含维生素C和番茄红素。在游戏中,番茄在30级解锁,生长时间为2小时,可用于制作番茄汁、披萨酱等产品。
hayday.definition_en: A red fruit-vegetable rich in vitamin C and lycopene. Used to make tomato juice, pizza sauce, and many other products.
hayday.example_en: Fresh tomatoes are perfect for making healthy tomato juice.
hayday.example_zh: 新鲜番茄非常适合制作健康的番茄汁。

hayday.definition_zh: 蓝莓是一种小型的蓝紫色浆果,富含抗氧化剂,被誉为超级食物。在游戏中,蓝莓在30级解锁,用于制作蓝莓派和果汁。
hayday.definition_en: Small blue-purple berries rich in antioxidants, considered a superfood. Used to make blueberry pie and juices.
hayday.example_en: Pick fresh blueberries to bake delicious blueberry muffins.
hayday.example_zh: 采摘新鲜蓝莓来烘焙美味的蓝莓松饼。

hayday.definition_zh: 草莓是一种红色的心形浆果,味道香甜,深受人们喜爱,富含维生素C。
hayday.definition_en: A red, heart-shaped berry that is sweet and beloved, rich in vitamin C.

hayday.definition_zh: 土豆是一种重要的根茎类作物,富含淀粉和营养,可以用多种方式烹饪。在游戏中,土豆在35级解锁,用于制作薯条、土豆泥等食品。
hayday.definition_en: An important root vegetable rich in starch and nutrients that can be cooked in many ways. Used to make fries and mashed potatoes.
hayday.example_en: Grow potatoes to make crispy french fries for your customers.
hayday.example_zh: 种植土豆来为你的顾客制作酥脆的炸薯条。

hayday.definition_zh: 可可是巧克力的原料,来自可可树的种子。在游戏中,可可在36级解锁,生长时间较长,用于制作巧克力和可可粉。
hayday.definition_en: The source of chocolate, made from cacao tree seeds. Unlocked at level 36 and used to make chocolate and cocoa powder.
hayday.example_en: Harvest cacao pods to produce rich chocolate products.
hayday.example_zh: 收获可可豆荚来生产浓郁的巧克力产品。

hayday.definition_zh: 咖啡豆是咖啡饮料的原料,经过烘焙后具有独特的香气和风味。在游戏中,咖啡豆在42级解锁,用于制作各种咖啡饮品。
hayday.definition_en: The raw material for coffee beverages, with unique aroma and flavor after roasting. Used to make various coffee drinks.
hayday.example_en: Grow coffee beans to brew fresh espresso for your café.
hayday.example_zh: 种植咖啡豆来为你的咖啡馆冲泡新鲜浓缩咖啡。

hayday.definition_zh: 洋甘菊是一种具有药用价值的草本植物,常用于制作舒缓镇静的花草茶。在游戏中,洋甘菊在45级解锁,用于制作洋甘菊茶。
hayday.definition_en: A medicinal herb commonly used to make soothing and calming herbal tea. Unlocked at level 45 for making chamomile tea.
hayday.example_en: Harvest chamomile flowers to brew relaxing herbal tea.
hayday.example_zh: 收获洋甘菊花朵来冲泡放松的花草茶。

hayday.definition_zh: 鸡是农场中最基础的动物,在1级就可以解锁。母鸡每隔一段时间会产下鸡蛋,鸡蛋可以用于制作煎蛋、蛋糕等多种食品。鸡需要放在鸡舍中饲养,并定期喂食鸡饲料。
hayday.definition_en: The first farm animal you unlock. Chickens lay eggs regularly, which are essential ingredients for many recipes like bacon and eggs, cakes, and cookies.
hayday.example_en: Feed your chickens regularly to collect fresh eggs every day.
hayday.example_zh: 定期喂养你的鸡以每天收集新鲜鸡蛋。

hayday.definition_zh: 奶牛在6级解锁,是农场的重要动物。奶牛每隔一段时间会产出牛奶,牛奶可以用于制作奶油、黄油、奶酪、冰淇淋等多种乳制品。奶牛需要住在牛棚里,并喂食牛饲料。
hayday.definition_en: Cows produce milk, which is used to make cream, butter, cheese, and ice cream. They must be housed in cow sheds and fed with cow feed.
hayday.example_en: Your cows produce fresh milk that can be turned into delicious dairy products.
hayday.example_zh: 你的奶牛生产新鲜牛奶,可以制成美味的乳制品。

hayday.definition_zh: 猪在10级解锁。猪可以生产培根,这是一种美味的腌制猪肉,可用于制作培根鸡蛋、培根派等食品。猪需要住在猪圈里,并喂食猪饲料。
hayday.definition_en: Pigs produce bacon, a cured meat product used in recipes like bacon and eggs, bacon pie, and hamburgers. Pigs live in pig pens and eat pig feed.
hayday.example_en: Raise pigs on your farm to harvest bacon for cooking delicious meals.
hayday.example_zh: 在农场饲养猪来收获培根烹饪美味佳肴。

hayday.definition_zh: 绵羊在16级解锁。绵羊生产羊毛,羊毛是制作各种纺织品的重要原料,可以用来制作毛衣、羊毛帽、羊毛裤等服装。绵羊需要住在羊圈里,并喂食羊饲料。
hayday.definition_en: Sheep produce wool, which is essential for making clothing items like sweaters, woolly hats, and wooly chaps. They live in sheep pens and need sheep feed.
hayday.example_en: Shear your sheep regularly to collect soft wool for knitting warm clothes.
hayday.example_zh: 定期剪你的羊毛来收集柔软的羊毛编织保暖衣物。

hayday.definition_zh: 山羊在32级解锁。山羊生产羊奶,羊奶可以用来制作山羊奶酪、披萨等特色食品。山羊需要住在山羊棚里,并喂食山羊饲料。
hayday.definition_en: Goats produce goat milk, which is used to make goat cheese and pizza. Goats need goat sheds and goat feed to thrive.
hayday.example_en: Goat milk makes excellent cheese that customers love in pizza recipes.
hayday.example_zh: 羊奶制作出顾客喜爱的优质奶酪,用于披萨配方。

hayday.definition_zh: 蜜蜂在39级解锁。蜜蜂生产蜂巢,蜂巢可以加工成蜂蜜。蜂蜜是一种天然甜味剂,可用于制作蜂蜜爆米花、蜂蜜苹果蛋糕等美食。蜜蜂住在蜂箱里,不需要喂食。
hayday.definition_en: Honey bees produce honeycombs, which can be processed into honey. Honey is a natural sweetener used in many recipes. Bees live in beehives and don't require feed.
hayday.example_en: Your bees work hard to produce sweet honey for delicious treats.
hayday.example_zh: 你的蜜蜂勤劳工作生产甜美的蜂蜜制作美味佳肴。

hayday.definition_zh: 鸭子在50级解锁。鸭子生产鸭毛,鸭毛可以用来制作枕头、羽绒服等舒适的产品。鸭子需要住在鸭舍里,并喂食鸭饲料。
hayday.definition_en: Ducks produce duck feathers, which are used to make pillows and down jackets. Ducks live in duck salons and need to be fed duck feed.
hayday.example_en: Collect duck feathers to craft soft, comfortable pillows for your customers.
hayday.example_zh: 收集鸭毛为顾客制作柔软舒适的枕头。

hayday.definition_zh: 松鼠在62级解锁。松鼠会收集花生,花生可以用于制作花生酱、花生糖等食品。松鼠需要住在松鼠屋里。
hayday.definition_en: Squirrels collect peanuts, which are used to make peanut butter, peanut brittle, and other snacks. They live in squirrel houses.
hayday.example_en: Watch your squirrels gather peanuts to make tasty peanut butter.
hayday.example_zh: 看你的松鼠收集花生来制作美味的花生酱。

hayday.definition_zh: 大象是陆地上最大的动物,拥有长长的鼻子和大耳朵。在保护区中,可以饲养成年大象和小象。
hayday.definition_en: The largest land animal with a long trunk and big ears. Both adults and calves can be raised in the sanctuary.

hayday.definition_zh: 长颈鹿拥有世界上最长的脖子,可以吃到高处的树叶。它们的斑点图案非常独特。
hayday.definition_en: Has the world's longest neck to reach high leaves. Each giraffe's spot pattern is unique.

hayday.definition_zh: 河马是半水生的大型哺乳动物,喜欢在水中度过大部分时间,但实际上不会游泳。
hayday.definition_en: A large semi-aquatic mammal that spends most of its time in water but cannot actually swim.

hayday.definition_zh: 斑马以其独特的黑白条纹而闻名,每只斑马的条纹图案都是独一无二的。
hayday.definition_en: Famous for its unique black and white stripes. Each zebra's stripe pattern is one of a kind.

hayday.definition_zh: 大猩猩是最大的灵长类动物,非常聪明,与人类DNA相似度达98%。
hayday.definition_en: The largest primate, highly intelligent with 98% DNA similarity to humans.

hayday.definition_zh: 驯鹿生活在寒冷地区,是圣诞老人雪橇队的成员。它们的鹿角非常雄伟。
hayday.definition_en: Lives in cold regions and is a member of Santa's sleigh team. They have magnificent antlers.

hayday.definition_zh: 北极狐生活在极地地区,拥有厚厚的毛皮来抵御严寒。
hayday.definition_en: Arctic foxes live in polar regions with thick fur to withstand extreme cold.

hayday.definition_zh: 猎豹是陆地上跑得最快的动物,时速可达120公里。它们身上有独特的黑色斑点。
hayday.definition_en: The fastest land animal, capable of speeds up to 120 km/h. They have distinctive black spots.

hayday.definition_zh: 海象生活在北极地区,拥有长长的獠牙,可以用来在冰上移动和防御。
hayday.definition_en: Lives in Arctic regions with long tusks used for moving on ice and defense.

hayday.definition_zh: 狐獴是小型群居动物,经常站立起来警戒周围环境,非常机警可爱。
hayday.definition_en: Small social animals that often stand upright to watch their surroundings, very alert and adorable.

hayday.definition_zh: 鱼类在27级随渔湖解锁。不同于其他农场动物,鱼需要在渔湖中垂钓捕获。鱼可以加工成鱼片,用于制作炸鱼薯条、寿司等海鲜菜肴。
hayday.definition_en: Fish are caught in the fishing lake and can be processed into fish fillets. Used to make fish and chips, sushi, and other seafood dishes.
hayday.example_en: Catch fresh fish from the lake and fillet them for tasty seafood recipes.
hayday.example_zh: 从湖中捕捉新鲜的鱼并切成鱼片做美味的海鲜菜肴。

hayday.definition_zh: 龙虾在44级解锁,在渔湖中捕获。龙虾可以加工成龙虾尾,这是一种高级海鲜食材,用于制作各种精致菜肴。
hayday.definition_en: Lobsters are caught in the fishing lake and provide lobster tails, a premium seafood ingredient used in gourmet recipes.
hayday.example_en: Lobster tails are a delicacy that fetch high prices at the roadside shop.
hayday.example_zh: 龙虾尾是一种美味佳肴,在路边小店可以卖高价。

hayday.definition_zh: 狗是人类忠实的朋友。在游戏中,狗作为宠物可以在农场自由活动,喂养它们可以获得经验值和道具奖励。
hayday.definition_en: Man's best friend. Dogs are pets that roam freely on the farm and provide experience and rewards when fed.

hayday.definition_zh: 猫是可爱的宠物,喜欢在农场四处探索。喂养猫咪可以获得各种奖励。
hayday.definition_en: Cute pets that love to explore the farm. Feeding cats provides various rewards.

hayday.definition_zh: 鸡蛋是农场中最基础的动物产品,由母鸡产出。鸡蛋富含蛋白质,可以用来制作煎蛋、蛋糕、饼干等多种食品。
hayday.definition_en: Eggs are produced by chickens and are essential ingredients for many recipes.
hayday.example_en: Collect fresh eggs from your chickens to make delicious breakfast items.
hayday.example_zh: 从鸡舍收集新鲜鸡蛋来制作美味的早餐。

hayday.definition_zh: 牛奶是奶牛生产的白色营养液体,富含钙质和蛋白质。牛奶是制作各种乳制品的基础原料。
hayday.definition_en: Milk is produced by cows and serves as the base ingredient for many dairy products.

hayday.definition_zh: 培根是用猪肉腌制和烟熏制成的肉制品,味道咸香可口。
hayday.definition_en: Bacon is a cured and smoked pork product with a savory, salty flavor.

hayday.definition_zh: 羊毛是从绵羊身上剪下的天然纤维,柔软保暖,用于制作纺织品和服装。
hayday.definition_en: Wool is a natural fiber sheared from sheep, soft and warm, used for making textiles and clothing.

hayday.definition_zh: 蜂蜜是蜜蜂采集花蜜酿造的天然甜味剂,营养丰富,具有独特的香甜味道。
hayday.definition_en: Honey is a natural sweetener produced by bees from flower nectar, rich in nutrients with a unique sweet flavor.

hayday.definition_zh: 面包是用小麦面粉烘焙而成的主食,是人类最古老的食物之一。
hayday.definition_en: Bread is a staple food baked from wheat flour, one of humanity's oldest foods.

hayday.definition_zh: 黄油是通过搅拌奶油制成的固体乳制品,富含脂肪和维生素。
hayday.definition_en: Butter is a solid dairy product made by churning cream, rich in fat and vitamins.

hayday.definition_zh: 奶酪是通过凝固牛奶蛋白质制成的乳制品,有独特的风味和口感。
hayday.definition_en: Cheese is a dairy product made by curdling milk proteins, with unique flavors and textures.
